title: Art of Coloring: Mickey & Minnie: 100 Images to Inspire Creativity
description: Part of the Art of Coloring series, which has sold over 2 million copies across the U.S.Fun, funny, and feisty patterns and character designs permeate the near-ninety-year history of Disney’s beloved Mickey and Minnie. These images are ideal for taking pencil to paper and adding your own brand of color and style. Perfect for cultivating creativity, relaxation, and focus, these pages are filled with line art from Disney animation, comics, and more―featuring work from Ub Iwerks, Floyd Gottfredson, and more.Collect the entire Art of Coloring series!
author: Walt Disney Company
